fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to attack, dealing a Powerful attack and resetting your Hunger if successful. {You will not attack if you are not the only visitor}. Other visitors at the home witness you.
- If anybody visits you, you will attack them instead. {You will only do this if you have exactly one visitor}. Other visitors witness you.
- Without losing charges, automatically Cleave if you are one night from dying of hunger; alternatively, manually Cleave at night. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a 3 night Hunger timer where you die of Hunger if it ends.
- Players that witness you receive the notification: "You saw Bigfoot (5420) at your target's home!"
- Astral Visitors do not count towards the visitor count; however, they witness you if you attack anybody.
- Players killed by you have their cause of death unknown.
- Roleblock Immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see Good-aligned factions lose. (wins with other factions)
